Articles.Content:
I just realized how much energy I waste by braking or pressing S when driving my rovers downhill. Wouldn't it be nice to recover that energy in form of electric charge?

Would this be possible by adapting some settings in the wheel config? Maybe make ModuleWheelBrakes consume negative EC? How about ModuleWheelMotor, is there a setting that can achieve energy recuperation, or would that require a new module?
